message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper proposes a novel curriculum learning approach for image classification using a probability distribution over classes as target label, which can be based on prior knowledge. The approach was evaluated on several popular deep learning architectures for image classification task applied to three datasets, ImageNet, CIFAR100, and AWA2. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper involves the use of prior knowledge, which suggests the possibility of belonging to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) sub-categories.
